headline: The World of Mezcal Evolves and Grows
abstract: The choices now abound, but the best bottles are rare and often expensive. Whatâ€™s inside is sometimes quirky and almost always joyous.
lead_paragraph: Looking back at the last time the spirits panel tasted mezcal, I was shocked to realize that almost a decade had passed. The flavors and the sense of discovery we experienced still seemed so fresh.
